thread.title: Re: Still digging? Chris Cuomo out-jackasses himself with this take on 12-year-old girls (and their parents)
thread.title_full: Re: Still digging? Chris Cuomo out-jackasses himself with this take on 12-year-old girls (and their parents)

author: Gregor Eisenstein
title: Re: Still digging? Chris Cuomo out-jackasses himself with this take on 12-year-old girls (and their parents)
text:
— Adam Strange (@Adam_Strange) February 27, 2017 . @ChrisCuomo Still with this mess? Let it go… 
— Dale Jackson (@TheDaleJackson) February 27, 2017 
Somebody take away his shovel — STAT! 
Last week, CNN’s Chris Cuomo made a bona fide jackass of himself when he attempted to shame 12-year-old girls — and their “overprotective and intolerant dad” — for not wanting to share a bathroom or locker room with a boy or man who happens to identify as female. Believe it or not, he still hasn’t learned his lesson. 
After a debate this morning with talk radio host Ben Ferguson: . @ChrisCuomo and @benfergusonshow spar over transgender High School wrestler controversy https://t.co/asTwjA1Hg6 
— New Day (@NewDay) February 27, 2017 
Cuomo doubled — or is it tripled? quadrupled? — down: "Could make my kid uncomfortable." Has been happening already for a while – why no cases of assumed discomfort? Because this is abt parents 
— Christopher C. Cuomo (@ChrisCuomo) February 27, 2017 Of course not ok for 12yo girl to be exposed to male genitals. just doesn't happen. That's my point. This is abt tolerance not predation. 
— Christopher C. Cuomo (@ChrisCuomo) February 27, 2017 Trending
